name: Blob Blast (Future games)
description:
A simple game. Arrow keys to aim.

Story It is 2352 and weaponry is more advanced than ever. Humans are smug about their power  and are ready to fight anything. But when the aliens arrive by the thousands, and a shortage of soldiers grips the humans, you sign up to be a cannon gunner. Can you survive and save the world? Or is humanity doomed... Play Blob Blast 2

Play Blob Blast 3
